caption_text:
Live drumming + DJ set = 🔥✨🥁

We are so excited to welcome Auraboros back to EDKW community! Get ready for organic, tribal, and traditional sounds overlayed with LIVE PERCUSSION bringing new life and rhythm to electronic music 🥁

🌕 Leo Full Moon - Ecstatic Dance Party & Cacao Ceremony
📅 Fri, Jan 30th
🕖 7:00 PM – 11:59 PM
📍 Conrad Centre for the Performing Arts — Kitchener, ON
🎟️ = 🔗in bio 

What to expect: 
🔥 Opening body-activation workshop
🍫 Intentional cacao ceremony to open your heart
🎶 3+ hrs of ecstatic dance with three amazing DJs
🎨 Live art & community vibes
🛌 A grounding closing soundbath
💧 Alcohol-free + embodied, inclusive space for all ✨

More about Chris:

What happens when a lifelong metal drummer discovers multi-genre DJing? Musical snakes eating their own tails is what.

Launched in late 2024, Auraboros (aka Chris Taylor) has already found solid footing in Canada’s conscious dance scene, with appearances at Chocolate Groove, Daybreaker, Alternity, Floorplay, a resident DJ slot at Ecstatic Dance Toronto, and summer festival sets including Bumi Fest, Anahata, Sonic Springs and Toronto Tantra Fest.

Juggling both live drumming and DJ mixing at once, his sets take you far from where they begin, through wide-ranging tempos and genres to land you somewhere different yet familiar, just like his own life’s journey.

Auraboros is here,.. and there, and back again.
